
                            
                            <p>当时都说太丑了，只撸了3件。到手发现冰丝材质手感还不错，有没有类似的平替推荐一下？30-50价位。拼夕夕搜了同款好像都是贴牌高仿海澜之家。 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/11/195203hxuy9x3j9vxyz3po.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/11/195203hxuy9x3j9vxyz3po.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">网易严选</p>
